name: filebus
description: I/O based on inotify and file watchers

scripts.build: npm run cjs && npm run test
scripts.cjs: ascjs esm cjs && npm run clean:fb && npm run clean:fbin && npm run clean:fbout && npm run clean:require
scripts.clean:require: sed -i 's/(m => m.__esModule [^)]*)//' cjs/filebus-in.js && sed -i 's/(m => m.__esModule [^)]*)//' cjs/index.js

author: Andrea Giammarchi
